# SignUpTaxInfoExemptStatus

Status of the account tax exemption. Applicable if you use Zuora Tax or Connect tax engines. Required if you use Zuora Tax.  

## Enum

* `NO` (value: `'No'`)

* `YES` (value: `'Yes'`)

* `PENDINGVERIFICATION` (value: `'PendingVerification'`)
